items.name: Horror Finger
explicitMods: Adds 3 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

items.name: Rearguard
implicitMods: Adds 7 to 13 Physical Damage to Attacks
flavourText: "It's a rare man that has eyes in the back of his head."

socketedItems.name: Hollow Sight
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an Abyssal Socket on an Item or into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Widowhail
explicitMods: 247% increased bonuses gained from Equipped Quiver
flavourText: "I loosed a volley of arrows into the heart of the man
who slew my beloved. There was no satisfaction, no
healing, no revenge. There was only... emptiness."
- Chieftainess Ahuana of the Ramako Tribe

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any bow or wand attack skill, causing it to summon a ballista totem that uses the skill for you.
explicitMods: Supported Attack Skills cannot be used with Melee Weapons
Supported Skills will summon a Ballista Totem which uses that Skill
Supported Skills have +2 to maximum number of Summoned Ballista Totems
Supported Skills have 50% less Attack Speed
Supported Skills have 20% increased Totem Placement speed
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills which summon totems.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow that remains in the ground behind its final target, tethering that enemy to it. Ensnared enemies always count as moving, and have less movement speed while trying to break the snare. The snare will break if they leave the area of effect.
explicitMods: Ensnared Enemies take 20% increased Projectile Damage from Attack Hits
Each Snare applies 40% less Movement Speed to Normal or Magic Enemies
Each Snare applies 30% less Movement Speed to Rare Enemies
Each Snare applies 25% less Movement Speed to Unique Enemies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention

items.name: Devoto's Devotion
enchantMods: Void Sphere has 18% increased Pulse Frequency

when borne on wings of divine providence.

socketedItems.secDescrText: An icy blast explodes around the caster, dealing cold damage to enemies, and leaving behind a whirling vortex which deals cold damage over time and chills enemies caught in it. If the caster targets near their Frostbolt projectiles, it will explode from a number of those projectiles instead, destroying them.
explicitMods: Deals 518 Base Cold Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
20% less Area of Effect when Cast on Frostbolt
Can explode from up to 5 Frostbolt Projectiles

items.name: Defiance of Destiny
explicitMods: Gain 39% of Missing Unreserved Life before being Hit by an Enemy
flavourText: The farmer was struck again and again, but he refused to stay down.
Astonished, the raiding warlord ordered the man's family spared.

items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. It also regularly releases pulses of area damage. The Void Sphere will consume the corpses of any enemies which die in its area. Can only have one Void Sphere at a time.
explicitMods: Void Sphere has 10% increased Pulse Frequency
40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Enemies in range are Hindered, with up to 30% reduced Movement Speed, based on distance from the Void Sphere
